title: Ferdowsi University of Mashhad - Hydroinformatics
description: Familiarity with concepts and methods of data processing in water.

title: Ferdowsi University of Mashhad - Water Resources Engineering
description: The aim of this course is to familiarize students with water resources and to acquire skills in modeling water resources with a focus on reservoir dams.
